question: Once your infrastructure project is completed, will the operations of this infrastructure be technically challenging; will it fall outside the current expertise of your team; or do you not want to staff up a new operations team?
description: For instance, your government entity has municipalized a private utility system that requires significant technically challenging new capital improvements that you would rather an experienced vendor handle. Example: South Martin Regional Utilityâ€™s acquisition and merger of two private water utilities and simultaneous O&M P3.
